content.text: Hi, I'm a doctor. My wife is a nurse. We have 2 kids and we love to play baseball. Our favorite place to go is the mountains. What about you?
Hi, nice to meet you! I'm a cook. My mother is from Greece and my father is from India. I love the color green and I love to swim when the weather is hot. What are your hobbies?
We love playing baseball and swimming. We also enjoy spending time in the mountains. What do you enjoy doing for fun?
I love cooking, swimming, and traveling. I also like to go to concerts and watch movies. What are your favorite movies?
I love action movies and comedies. I also like to watch documentaries and TV shows. What are your favorite shows?
I love The Office, Parks and Recreation, and Brooklyn Nine-Nine. I also like to watch documentaries about history and science. What are your favorite foods?
I love Italian food and seafood. I also enjoy Mexican food and sushi. What are your favorite dishes?
I love Greek food, Indian food, and Chinese food. I also enjoy Mediterranean food and pizza. What are your favorite colors?
I love blue, green, and red. I also like black and white. What are your favorite colors?
I love green, blue, and yellow. I also like purple and orange. What are your favorite places to travel?
I love the mountains, the beach, and the city. I also enjoy traveling to different countries. What are your favorite places to travel?
I love Greece, India, and China. I also enjoy traveling to Europe and North America. What are your favorite hobbies?
I love playing sports, reading books, and watching movies. I also enjoy spending time with my family and friends. What are your hobbies?
I love cooking, swimming, and traveling. I also enjoy playing video games and reading books.
